row.process:
:DEFINE &T_MYHOST#, string, 100 :DEFINE &T_MYIP#, string, 100 :FILL &T_MYIP#[] = STR_SPLIT(&LISTE_IP#," ") :FILL &T_MYHOST#[] = STR_SPLIT(&LISTE_HOSTNAME#," ") :SET &RUNVAR# = 1 :SET &MY_RC#="OK" :WHILE &RUNVAR# LE &NUMBER_CLIENT# : PRINT "Line &RUNVAR#: &T_MYHOST#[&RUNVAR#]" : IF &T_MYHOST#[&RUNVAR#] = &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# : PSET &GLOBAL_IP# = &T_MYIP#[&RUNVAR#] : ENDIF :SET &RUNVAR# = &RUNVAR# + 1 :ENDWHILE
:SET &MY_USER#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.WINDNS,USER) :SET &MY_PASSWORD#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.WINDNS,PASSWORD) :SET &MY_WINDSNSERVER#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.WINDNS,WINDNSSERVER) :SET &MY_ZONENAME#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.WINDNS,ZONENAME) :SET &MY_DNSTOOLS#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.WINDNS,DNSTOOLS) :DEFINE &MY_RC#,string
:SET &MY_RC#=KO :DEFINE &MY_RC#,string :BEGIN_EXT_INT POWERSHELL $Username = "&MY_USER#" $Password = "&MY_PASSWORD#" Write-Host "DEBUG1 " + $Username Write-Host "DEBUG2 " + $Password $pass = ConvertTo-SecureString -AsPlainText $Password -Force $Cred = New-Object System.Management.Automation.PSCredential -ArgumentList $Username,$pass write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" get-executionpolicy write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" Invoke-Command -ComputerName &MY_DNSTOOLS# {Add-DnsServerResourceRecordA -Name &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# -ZoneName "&MY_ZONENAME#" -AllowUpdateAny -IPv4Address &GLOBAL_IP# -TimeToLive 01:00:00 -CreatePtr} -credential $cred write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" $exitCode="ok" if ($exitCode -eq "ok") { :REGISTER_VARIABLE "MY_RC#","OK" } write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" :END_EXT_INT POWERSHELL

row.post_process: :IF &MY_RC# = "OK" : PRINT OK: WINDNS SET IP &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# &GLOBAL_IP# : PSET &EXIT_KISS_OK#="&EXIT_KISS_OK#,WINDNS SET_IP OK &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# &GLOBAL_IP#" :ELSE : PRINT KO: WINDNS SET IP &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# &GLOBAL_IP# : PSET &EXIT_KISS_KO#="&EXIT_KISS_KO#,WINDNS SET IP &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# &GLOBAL_IP#" : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT = "KO: WINDNS SET_IP" : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE = 10 : ENDIF
